document.full_text: the referee took issue with a twitter message suggesting he intentionally made an incorrect call to make up for a previous bad call that went against the minnesota timberwolves.
document.title: n.b.a. ref sues a.p., sports writer over twitter post
lines_and_colors: the referee took issue with a twitter message suggesting he intentionally made an incorrect call to make up for a previous bad call that went against the minnesota timberwolves.
